Equations are made using [LaTeX](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/LaTeX/Mathematics)

**In-line:**

The equation for arithmetic mean is as follows: $\bar{x} = \frac{1}{n}\big(\sum_{i=1}^{n}x_i\big)$. However, this is an overly complicated way of writing it.

**Display equation:**

Standard Deviation:
$$
\sigma = \sqrt{\frac{\sum{}y_i^2 - \frac{(\sum{}y_i)^2}{n}}{n-1}}
$$
